summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Manufacturing ERP Phases 1-7. All 15 backend API tests passed. All frontend pages (Drum Schedule, Procurement, Finance Approval) load without errors. Fixed critical route ordering bug in purchase-orders/pending-approval endpoint.
passed_tests: GET /api/inventory-items returns items with IN_STOCK/INBOUND/OUT_OF_STOCK status
GET /api/email/outbox returns SMTP status NOT_CONFIGURED and empty email list
POST /api/rfq creates new RFQ with DRAFT status
PUT /api/rfq/:id/send marks RFQ as SENT and queues email
PUT /api/rfq/:id/quote updates RFQ with prices and changes status to QUOTED
POST /api/rfq/:id/convert-to-po converts quoted RFQ to PO
PUT /api/purchase-orders/:id/send sends approved PO and queues email
GET /api/production/drum-schedule returns schedule with 600/day capacity enforcement
Drum Schedule page loads without 'Invalid time value' error
Procurement Management page loads with RFQ/Requisitions tabs
Finance Approval page loads with SMTP NOT_CONFIGURED banner
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ Route ordering fixed: /purchase-orders/pending-approval now comes before /purchase-orders/{po_id} to prevent path parameter matching
✓ All inventory items correctly return status field (IN_STOCK/INBOUND/OUT_OF_STOCK)
✓ SMTP email queue working as expected - emails remain QUEUED when SMTP not configured
✓ RFQ workflow complete: create → send → quote → convert to PO
✓ Finance approval workflow complete: pending → approve/reject → send
✓ All frontend pages load without console errors
✓ No 'Invalid time value' error on Drum Schedule page
seed_data_creation: Tests created test suppliers, inventory items, RFQs, and POs during execution. All test data prefixed with TEST_ for easy identification.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phases 1-7 features are working correctly. Backend APIs tested via pytest (15/15 passed). Frontend pages tested via Playwright (all load successfully). Fixed critical bug: route ordering for /purchase-orders/pending-approval. SMTP is intentionally NOT_CONFIGURED as per requirements - emails remain QUEUED. Drum Schedule shows 600/day capacity enforcement. No 'Invalid time value' error detected.
